sentence: It's hard to blame him when he has to deal with GOP troublemakers like Reps. Lauren Boebert (Colo.), Marjorie Taylor Greene (Ga.), Madison Cawthorn (N.C.), and Paul Gosar (Ariz.).
author: Grayson Quay
title: The GOP might retake Congress in the midterms. Then what?

sentence: Other attendees of the fundraiser on Wednesday include Congressmen Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina and Jim Jordan of Ohio.

title: Over 50 House Republicans attend fundraiser for Liz Cheney's challenger, Harriet Hageman

sentence: Is Palin going to stand out in a Republican caucus alongside the likes of Reps. Madison Cawthorn (N.C.), Marjorie Taylor Greene (Ga.), Lauren Boebert (Colo.), and Matt Gaetz (Fla.)?
title: Opinion: Sarah Palin is back, for a GOP that was remade in her image

sentence: Return to menu North Carolina state Sen. Chuck Edwards, who's mounting a GOP primary challenge to embattled Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), has a new ad out in which he compares Cawthorn's celebrity status to that of the Kardashians.
title: Post Politics Now With Romney and Murkowski's pledged votes, Jackson has clear path to confirmation

sentence: Washington is meanwhile still reverberating with a bizarre episode triggered by Republican North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn's claim he was invited to an orgy and saw leaders in the nation's anti-drug fight snorting cocaine.

title: Obama and Romney are back, and show how American politics have changed for the worse
